title: Bio
des: I am skilled software developer with three years of experience in frontend development and one year in site reliability engineering (SRE).Currently I have expanded my skills into SRE, where I focus on improving system reliability, performance, and scalability. I work with cloud infrastructure,  monitoring tools, and automation to ensure high availability of critical services.My expertise lies in building responsive and user-friendly web applications, ensuring seamless user experiences across different devices and platforms.

title: Skills
des: I have a strong command of modern frontend technologies, including React, nextjs, and JavaScript frameworks, graphql, cms and I focus on writing clean, maintainable code. My role in SRE involves optimizing deployments, handling incident response, and implementing best practices for system resilience. With a blend of frontend and SRE expertise, I bring a unique perspective in developing robust applications that are both user-centric and highly reliable.
